actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to exempt firefighters and police officers from the Government Pension Offset and Windfall Elimination Provisions under the Social Security Act.
short_title: Social Security Fairness for Firefighters and Police Officers Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Social Security Fairness for Firefighters and Police Officers Act

This bill amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to exempt firefighters and law enforcement officers with at least five years of service from the Government Pension Offset and Windfall Elimination provisions.

titles.title: Social Security Fairness for Firefighters and Police Officers Act
